|stockos = Linux;2.6.30;; |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_conn = |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes,, internal,, 6-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, J505,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = VDSL2, ADSL2+ |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.0.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = ''randomly generated'' |defaultssid = CenturyLinkXXXX |defaultssid_regex = ^CenturyLink[0-9]{4}$ |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = common |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 04/28/2012 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 789286808226 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B008EM6XBQ |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "Actiontec" and "06713B" is silkscreened on the board in :the FCC photos as well as a production model board. The FCC photos are not terribly illuminating for this device. :The logs below indicate the switch used is a BCM53125. ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.actiontec.com/products/datasheets/C1000a%20datasheet_final.pdf Datasheet] ===Specifications=== *[https://openwrt.org/toh/actiontec/c1000a ''Actiontec C1000A'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki] *[https://www.cnet.com/products/actiontec-wireless-n-vdsl2-modem-router/specs/ ''Actiontec C1000A Spec'' on '''C|Net'''] *[https://www.walmart.com/ip/CenturyLink-Modem-and-Wireless-N-Router-Self-Install-Kit/22004595 ''Actiontec C1000A'' on '''Walmart'''] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|broadcomwifi}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/actiontec/actiontec_c1000a_1 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/actiontec/c1000a |forumpage = https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=51792 |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = ? |unsupportedfuncntions = DSL |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== 
(...) (...) (...) (TxD) (RxD) (GND)
                                     J505
--------------> to SoC + heatsink assembly
====Credentials==== They're the same as the factory default credentials on the label. ====Info derived from==== {{/Serialinfo}} [[Category:English Documentation]]
